targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1 and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_ready{condition="true", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 0)
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1)
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1)
count(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} > 0)
count(kube_daemonset_status_number_unavailable{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} > 0)
count((kube_statefulset_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} - kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0)
kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}
kube_daemonset_status_number_unavailable{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}
kube_statefulset_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} - kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}
sum by (cluster) (kube_node_info{cluster=~"$cluster"})
sum(kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready", status="true", cluster=~"$cluster"}) / sum(kube_node_info{cluster=~"$cluster"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1 ) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"})

count(kube_pod_container_info{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster)  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1) - count(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster)  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1)

count(kube_pod_container_info{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster)  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1) - count(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster)  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1)

count by (pod, namespace, cluster) (kube_pod_container_info{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster)  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1) unless on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}

count by (pod, namespace, cluster) (kube_pod_container_info{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster)  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1) unless on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}

sum by (node, cluster) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1 ) / sum by (node, cluster) (kube_node_status_allocatable_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster"})

sum by (node, cluster) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1) / sum by (node, cluster) (kube_node_status_allocatable_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster"})

topk(10,sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, cluster) /  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1 ) by (pod, cluster))

topk(10,sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, cluster) /  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1 ) by (pod, cluster))

bottomk(10,sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, cluster) /  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1 ) by (pod, cluster))

bottomk(10,sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, cluster) /  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1 ) by (pod, cluster))
